name: elimf

comment: Eliminate a mapping hypothesis for the weak deduction theorem ~ dedth , when a special case ` G : A --> B ` is provable, in order to convert ` F : A --> B ` from a hypothesis to an antecedent. (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-2006.)
